com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap
Class AdjacencyDissolveVisitor

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap.DissolveVisitor
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap.AdjacencyDissolveVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.operations.strategies.FeatureVisitor
public class AdjacencyDissolveVisitor
extends DissolveVisitor

This Visitor generates a dissolve of input layer based in adjacency criteria: it dissolves two polygons, if and only if they are adjacent.

TODO: To dissolve buffers from radial rings create a DissolveVisitor to compare FROM-TO Fields.

Author:
azabala

visit

public void visit(com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.IGeometry g,
                  int index)
           throws com.iver.cit.gvsig.exceptions.visitors.VisitorException,
                  com.iver.cit.gvsig.exceptions.visitors.ProcessVisitorException
We overwrite this method because we are not interested in save sumarization function values with dissolved features. Instead, we want to add buffer distance like an attribute of them.
